page.title: 05Employment in Lezant Area
page.content: A sample survey was taken of parents' occupations.We surveyed 76 parents. 38 men were employed and 0 unemployed. There were 10 women employed and 28 housewives.12 parents were involved with farms and farming and 6 parents were involved with teaching.We found out that 1 crop chemical specialist supplied all the farmers in the area. The second main job for men was building,4 parents did this job.There were a number of jobs with just 2 parents working in them,they were: school cooks,artists,lifeguards and fruit merchants.The main job for women was teaching.4 women did this.1 geologist was in the area and also 1 secretary.There was also 1 caretaker and 1 milkman that supplied all the area.Looking back in time we found that farming is still a popular job.
